content.question: In the country Beta it takes two hours of labor to produce a unit of tea and four hours of labor to produce a unit of bread. In the country Zeta it takes three hours of labor to produce a unit of tea and nine hours of labor to produce a unit of bread. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: Country Zeta has an absolute advantage in producing both tea and bread.
Country Zeta has an absolute advantage and a comparative advantage in producing tea.
Country Beta has an absolute advantage and a comparative advantage in producing tea.
Country Beta has the lower opportunity cost in producing bread and therefore a comparative advantage in producing bread.
Country Beta, with trade, will export both tea and bread to country Zeta.

content.answer: Country Beta has the lower opportunity cost in producing bread and therefore a comparative advantage in producing bread.
